numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows that only half of young men reach out to their parents once a week or a few days a week.
2. Nearly 75 percent of young women reach out to their parents every week.
3. Women are more likely than men to reach out to their parents.
4. I wonder why women are more likely than men to reach out to their parents.
6. This statistic relates to my community.
7. Less than a quarter of young men reach out to their parents in person every week.
8. Less than a quarter of young women reach out to their parents in person every week.
10. It can be hard to find time to visit parents in person.
11. A person may live far away from the parents.
12. A person may have a job.
13. If a person lives far away from the parents then it is harder for the person to visit the parents in person.
14. If a person has a job then it is harder for the person to visit the parents in person.
15. Sending a text to a parent every week is simple.
16. Sending a text to a parent every week is easy.
17. If a person sends a text to a parent every week then the person stays in contact with the parent.
